Table train, columns =*,Train_ID Name Time Service
Answer Visualize BAR SELECT Name , Total_Passengers FROM station LOCATION !=London

/* Question Show passengers of each location a bar chart . */
Database schema Table station, columns = [*,Station_ID Name Annual_entry_exit Annual_interchanges Total_Passengers Location Main_Services Number_of_Platforms]
Answer Visualize BAR SELECT Location , sum(total_passengers FROM station GROUP LOCATION
